channel.title: -64 to 64 in 1 sec, wait 15, goto -64 in 3 sec
channel.description:
does someone have a hint on how can I do this easily? in pd there is the line object where you put a list of values and times and that's it.. I have seen the line object but Im, limited by it's maximum time, (3.91s)
Maybe there is a magical object already that I'm missing?
greetings

item.title: -64 to 64 in 1 sec, wait 15, goto -64 in 3 sec
item.dc:creator: @servandisco servando barreiro
item.description:
@servandisco wrote:

Did it!.

feels a bit clunky but works..

Screen Shot 2019-03-17 at 6.29.45 PM.png1068x440 52.9 KB

item.title: -64 to 64 in 1 sec, wait 15, goto -64 in 3 sec
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

there is no such object at the moment. well an adsr kind of. but to fully emulate the pd line object you would need to change that quite essentially. do you need runtime control of the parameters?

Read full topic
